name: pull and push
description:
A short puzzlescript game about 2 cubes that can combine with each other with one needing to be pulled and the other needing to be pushed.

Mobile friendly version:  https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=4a24d9f5aebba5088a69469bf89e724d

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=4a24d9f5aebba5088a69469bf89e724d

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
